item.title: Linear Regression
item.description: Intro A linear regression model can be described using this function: f_{w,b}(x) = w \cdot x + b w and b are model parameters.

item.title: On The Issue of Prayer
item.description: If we pray for God’s will to be done, even though it will come to pass no matter what, then what is the true purpose of prayer? What is it’s true nature? What really is it? .

item.title: Vectorized Dot Product in C
item.description: Creating a microkernel (or \mu-kernel) to compute the dot product efficiently using SIMD (Simple Instruction, Multiple Data).
